dogBreeds.name: Poodle
dogBreeds.description: An intelligent and active breed with a curly, low-shedding coat, available in toy, miniature, and standard sizes.

dogBreeds.name: Cavoodle
dogBreeds.description: A small, affectionate, and friendly crossbreed with a soft, low-shedding coat, ideal for families.

dogBreeds.name: Labradoodle
dogBreeds.description: A friendly and energetic mix of Labrador and Poodle, known for its wavy or curly coat and sociable nature.

dogBreeds.name: Groodle
dogBreeds.description: A gentle and affectionate Golden Retriever-Poodle mix with a wavy, low-shedding coat and loving temperament.

dogBreeds.name: Spoodle
dogBreeds.description: A playful and loyal Cocker Spaniel-Poodle mix with a curly or wavy coat, great for active households.

dogBreeds.name: Dachshund
dogBreeds.description: A small, bold breed with a long body and short legs, available in smooth, wire-haired, or long-haired varieties.

dogBreeds.name: Pug
dogBreeds.description: A charming and mischievous small breed with a short, smooth coat and a distinctive wrinkled face.

dogBreeds.name: French Bulldog
dogBreeds.description: A compact and affectionate breed with bat-like ears, a smooth coat, and a playful, adaptable personality.

dogBreeds.name: Bulldog
dogBreeds.description: A calm and courageous medium-sized breed with a stocky build, short coat, and gentle demeanor.
